ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Here's one for the list to answer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, a lot of clerics are casting Resolution (110 mana, 250hp) in place of greater heal (150 mana, 300 hp).  It casts faster, is more efficient, and
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 23 Mar 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> Mark my words, this will get nerfed.
> Clerics currently use the level 19 buffs in place of the level 14 healing
> spell, because it's just about as efficient, and now it'll be nearly
> uninterruptable and chain-castable.

Yeah, a lot of clerics are casting Resolution (110 mana,
250hp) in place of greater heal (150 mana, 300 hp). It casts
faster, is more efficient, and because you probably already
have Resolution on all your group members, you're refreshing
it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
